title: Site Metadata
description: Global site metadata including identity, version, and connection details.

version.description: Semantic version of the data schema (e.g. "1.0.0").

name.description: Full display name of the portfolio owner.

oneLiner.description: Short tagline displayed on the home screen.

siteUrl.description: Public URL of the web portfolio.

sshAddress.description: Public URL of the browser-based TUI portfolio (e.g. "https://ssh.kpm.fyi").

sourceRepo.description: URL of the source code repository.
